opposite_reasoning: Vertebrate is the strongest opposite for Arthropod because: (1) It represents a complementary taxonomic division within the animal kingdom with maximum biological salience; (2) The invertebrate/vertebrate distinction is one of the most fundamental in zoology, with arthropods being the largest invertebrate phylum; (3) These categories are mutually exclusive and jointly exhaustive for most animal life; (4) Both concepts exist robustly in WordNet and SUMO; (5) The opposition is based on fundamental structural characteristics (exoskeleton vs endoskeleton, segmented body plan vs vertebral column) that create strong distributional separation. While this opposition has limited direct utility for AI safety monitoring (low steering utility score), it provides the cleanest semantic opposition for Fisher-LDA axis formation for this biological taxonomy concept.
